Talk:Course Reading List

From Hoomeamea

Jump to: navigation, search

Michael - I'll need to spend more than one class on beginning material. It's a promise I made when the course was set up as a 451. Some of the students will be coming in with no simulation background and we need to make them feel comfortable. I'm planning on using three classes to accomplish the introduction. That material is what I'll be working on tonight (Jan 17th). --P

Paul - how about the following suggestion for the composability readings for 2/8: chapters 1 and 2 of "Improving the composability of Department of Defense models and simulations" (47 pages) and all of "A Composability Lexicon" (7 pages)? --Ms6ep 16:18, 2 February 2007 (EST)
